Summary: 3 bright objects at 3 different locations near moo
divs: Sighting Details15 years ago at least when i was a kid i was getting ready to go on my paperroute. it was clear i could see the moon and what looked like 3 bright stars,one on the right, left, and one on the bottom. so as i was looking one movedthen the second and then the 3rd. started slow and then incredable fast speed in3 seperate directions they dissapeared. please believe this statement!
